column1: When they reached the first piece of fatty meat
column2: Hyena felt a jerk. One of Raven's tail feathers came off in his hand! Then there was another jerk
column3: and another. Raven felt much lighter
column4: and the ache in his tail was going. He sang: Raven's feathers
column7: Hyena sang the opposite: Raven's feathers hold on
column8: don't unpluck yourselves. Raven's feathers hold on
column10: the feathers could not hold Hyena anymore. He was in the middle of nowhere in the sky. He jumped onto the fatty meat thinking that as he ate
column11: the fatty meat would hold him. But as he tried to hold and eat the 'meat'
column12: all he felt was moist cloud! By now he was falling fast. "Help
column13: help!" he shouted. But no one could hear him. Raven was lost in the clouds. Hyena fell on the ground with a crash and lay silent for some minutes. He woke up howling in pain
column14: with a broken leg and dark scars all over his body. From that day to now
column15: Hyena limps and he has many scars on his body. He has never been able to fly.
